i have five children.
my doctor told me i have six months to live.

participant_2.background:
I've been with my husband for 5 years and we love to cosplay together.
I spend time with my book club and read books I love.
My weight is perfect for my body type and lifestyle.
my favorite sport is soccer.
I'm not comfortable sharing my ethnic background.

content.text: Hello!
Hello! How are you today?
I'm doing pretty well, how about you?
I'm doing good thanks! Just got back from a book club meeting, it was really fun.
That sounds really nice! I love book clubs. What book did you guys read this time?
We read "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald. It was a really good book, I really enjoyed it.
I've heard good things about that book, I've been meaning to read it for a while.
You definitely should, it's a classic for a reason!
I will, thanks for the recommendation! What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to cosplay with my husband, we have a lot of fun dressing up as our favorite characters.
That sounds really fun! I've never done cosplay before, but it looks like a lot of fun.
It is! It's a great way to express your creativity and have some fun with friends.
I'm sure it is, I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Thanks for the recommendation, I'll keep that in mind.
No problem! So, what do you do for fun?
Well, I like to read, swim, and spend time with my kids.
That sounds really nice! I love to swim too, it's so relaxing.
It is! I love being in the water.
Me too! So, how many kids do you have?
I have five kids, it can be a lot of work sometimes, but it's also a lot of fun.
Five kids! That's a lot! I can imagine it can be a lot of work, but it's definitely worth it.
It is! I love my kids very much.
I'm sure you do! They're lucky to have a mom like you.
Thanks! That means a lot.
No problem! It's nice to meet you.
It's nice to meet you too
